summary: A new subtle and lore-friendly Aela Facelift.
descriptionHtml:
This is a facelift of Aela the huntress that i made for myself because i hate how the vanilla Aela looks (upset Hagraven face). She is one of my favorite NPC in the game. YES i know there are a LOT of Aela facelift mods out there, but most of them make her look like a cutie pie or an ultra sexy supermodel and i hate that. I tried to make her lore friendly and similar to the vanilla version.

This is just a facelift mod for Aela the Huntress, it doesn't change anything besides her face.

- Install:

Make a backup and delete any other Aela's mod before you install this one (make sure that you delete Aela's face mesh and face tint too
before you install my mod, otherwise you will get a grey texture on her face)

The easy way, use NMM (Nexus Mod manager).
Activate the mod and place it at the bottom of your list.

The hard way.

-Go to the skyrim installation folder C:Program FilesSteamsteamappscommonSkyrim and drop the deadly_rose_aela.esp and
the folders meshes and textures of my mod inside your Data folder, overwrite if needed. (remember to make a backup first)


- Uninstall:

The easy way, use NMM (Nexus Mod manager).
Deactivate the mod that's all.


The hard way.

- Go to the skyrim installation folder and delete the following files:

deadly_rose_aela.esp C:Program FilesSteamsteamappscommonSkyrimdata

0001A696.nif C:Program FilesSteamsteamappscommonSkyrimDatameshesactorscharacterfacegendatafacegeomSkyrim.esm

0001A696.dds C:Program FilesSteamsteamappscommonSkyrimDatatexturesactorscharacterfacegendatafacetintSkyrim.esm


This mod should be compatible with everything except with other mods that alters Aela's looks.


- You'll need Coverwomen face textures by mrLenski if you want her to look exactly like the photos
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3563/? (Look 3)


She might look a slightly different in your game depending on the textures (and ENB) that you have installed.


If you see a grey texture on her face, uninstall my mod and go here:

C:Program FilesSteamsteamappscommonSkyrimDatameshesactorscharacterfacegendatafacegeomSkyrim.esm

C:Program FilesSteamsteamappscommonSkyrimDatatexturesactorscharacterfacegendatafacetintSkyrim.esm

delete these files 0001A696.dds and 0001A696.nif, then install my mod.
author: Ghostfox
